HomePage.description: The Dyson India homepage showcasing products and promotions.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

elements.name: Cart Icon
elements.description: Icon to navigate to the shopping cart.

assertions: At least one product category link is visible (e.g., 'Vacuum & wet cleaners')

DysonIndiaPage.description: This is the homepage of Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product details page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care Link
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Text: The most powerful, small-format purifier.

ProductsPage.description: This page allows the user to select items to customize their Dyson OnTrac™ (CNC Copper) product. It displays available items, their descriptions, and prices. The user can then add these items to their basket.

elements.name: OnTrac™ ear cushions (Khaki)
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac™ ear cushions (Khaki) product details.

elements.name: OnTrac™ outer caps (CNC Copper)
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac™ outer caps (CNC Copper) product details.

elements.name: Continue to basket (top)
elements.description: Button to proceed to the basket/checkout page.

elements.name: Continue to basket (bottom)
elements.description: Button to proceed to the basket/checkout page.

elements.name: Close Exclusive Offer
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer popup.

assertions: Continue to basket button is present

UnknownPage.description: This page is displayed when Chrome encounters an error and cannot display the requested webpage.
assertions: Page content indicates a connection error
